Hero.description: I'm a talented developer from Moscow. I know how to make beautiful and accessible websites. I have more than 4 years of coding behing my back along with a handful of projects.
Hero.heading: Mikhail Gostev

JobExperience.heading: Job experience
JobExperience.paragraph2: During 16 months working in the company, I had the following responsibilities:
JobExperience.image-alt: A man sitting on a stack of books

FeaturedProject.heading: Featured project
FeaturedProject.paragraph1: Nerif is an extension of my passion project that was born in late 2020. When I imagined data science as an important part of my future, I started working on an algorithm that would be able to predict the results of CS:GO matches.
FeaturedProject.paragraph2: It has proven to be unsuccessful, so I set a thought experiment: What would happen if it worked and the premise was actually marketable? That’s how Nerif was born.
FeaturedProject.image-alt: Mobile and desktop presentation of Nerif

HardSkills.heading: Hard skills
HardSkills.subheading: I know a lot of stuff

SoftSkills.heading: Soft skills
SoftSkills.paragraph1: I used to tutor English and Computer science, and still haven’t lost passion for <highlight>teaching.</highlight> I love sharing my knowledge with people and I’m quite proficient at it too
SoftSkills.paragraph2: I enjoy playing board games, whether it be with close friends or random people in an anticafe. Actually, I regularly host board game events there, which requires me to be <highlight>responsible,</highlight> good at <highlight>leadership,</highlight> and get along well with different people.

Contact.heading: Contact
Contact.paragraph1: I'm always happy to hear about exciting opportunities, and build valuable connections. Let's connect! You can send an e-mail or fill out the form. I’ll add the fourth line for the sake of layout.

LocaleLayout.title: Mikhail Gostev
LocaleLayout.description: Portfolio of a fullstack web developer
